DROP PROCEDURE CONTROL_SCHEMA.drop_table_sp

CREATE PROCEDURE CONTROL_SCHEMA.drop_table_sp
(@tableName VARCHAR(255))

AS

BEGIN
    DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(MAX);
    set @SQL = 'DROP TABLE dai_db.[' + @tableName + ']'
    EXEC(@SQL)

END


drop table if exists dai_db.traning_set


CREATE PROCEDURE CONTROL_SCHEMA.split_logic
(@tableName VARCHAR(255))

AS

BEGIN
    DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(MAX);
    SET @one =  @string)) 

END
